1.title: QS World University Rankings 2026 Results
1.description: Caspian State University of Technologies and Engineering named after Sh. Yessenov showed high results in the QS World University Rankings 2026.

2.title: Azerbaijan and Kazakhstan: Strengthening ties in the Year of Constitution and Sovereignty
2.description: The university implements joint projects to strengthen academic and cultural ties between Azerbaijan and Kazakhstan.

3.title: Joint meeting of KINI and DKU representatives
3.description: Issues of scientific cooperation between Caspian International University and University of Copenhagen Denmark were discussed.

4.title: Anti-corruption management system
4.description: A new anti-corruption management system has been implemented at the university, its effectiveness has been discussed.

5.title: Meeting with COEST delegation
5.description: Negotiations on future cooperation and joint projects took place between the university administration and the COEST delegation.

6.title: Opening of Shynabay Akkenzheev auditorium
6.description: The university solemnly opened a new auditorium named after the famous Kazakhstani scientist Shynabay Akkenzheev.

7.title: Kazakhstani students won at the world competition!
7.description: Students of Yessenov University won in an international technology competition, increasing the prestige of the university.

8.title: XVII Republican subject olympiad
8.description: In the second stage of the XVII Republican subject olympiad, held at the university, students demonstrated their knowledge.
